user.title: Set up Power Saver
user.description: Configure a power saver instance for an appliance. Select which Nord Pool sensor to use for price data. You can add multiple instances for different appliances.

data_description.nordpool_sensor: The Nord Pool sensor to use for electricity prices. If you have multiple Nord Pool entries (e.g., different price regions), select the one for this appliance.
data_description.name: A descriptive name for this instance (e.g., 'Water Heater').
data_description.selection_mode: Choose whether to activate the cheapest hours (default) or the most expensive hours. In 'Most expensive' mode the threshold roles described below are swapped.
data_description.min_hours: Minimum number of hours to keep active within each rolling window.
data_description.rolling_window_hours: Time window in hours to spread active slots across. Smaller values prevent long inactive gaps. 24 = optimize across the full day.
data_description.always_cheap_price: Price below which the slot is always activated, regardless of other settings. In 'Most expensive' mode: never activate below this price. Leave empty to disable.
data_description.always_expensive_price: Price at or above which the slot is never activated (safety cutoff). In 'Most expensive' mode: always activate above this price. Leave empty to disable.
data_description.price_similarity_pct: Also activate slots within this percentage of the cheapest price. For example, 20% means any slot up to 1.2× the cheapest price is also activated. In 'Most expensive' mode: computed from the most expensive price downward. Useful on flat-price days. Leave empty to disable.
data_description.min_consecutive_hours: Minimum number of consecutive hours per active block. Prevents short on/off cycling for appliances like water heaters. Short blocks are extended by activating adjacent slots. Leave empty to disable.
data_description.controlled_entities: Entities to turn on/off when state changes. Leave empty to control via your own automations.

error.nordpool_not_found: No Nord Pool integration found. Please set up the Nord Pool integration (HACS or native) before configuring Power Saver.
error.already_configured: A power saver with this name and sensor is already configured.

abort.already_configured: This power saver instance is already configured.
